name: Noodles
description:
A sublime mini-game to keep Noodle's hair on! If Noodles were not wrapping, it would be easier!

The first interactive NFT game from ZIM Founder Dr Abstract makes this NFT quite the collector's item. The unique game play, colorful dreadlocks and minimal expression can't help but conjure a smile!

The game is deftly coded with the ZIM JavaScript Canvas Framework with an embedded Box2D (Angry Birds) physics engine. All this plus the ZIM Game module for scores runs with one Crystal script calling zim_phsyics.js.

Dr Abstract is the inaugural member of the Gadget Minters See https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters for more info on the collective. Get collecting their pioneering interactive NFTs!
